import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Restaurant from './Restaurant'; function Search() { let { id, name } = useParams() let [filter, setFilter] = useState({ meal_type: id, sort: 1, }) let [restaurantList, setRestaurantList] = useState([]); let getFilterDetails = async () => { let url = 'http://localhost:4040/api/filter'; let { data } = await axios.post(url, filter); setRestaurantList(data.result) console.log(data); } useEffect(() => { getFilterDetails() }, []) return ( <>
